properties.description: Thursdays - 10am to 1pm The warm space is within the ECHO Shop in Leominster. We will be offering free coffee, hot chocolate, tea and a range of herbal teas. We will also have free fresh cakes and biscuits on offer. We are also encouraging people to bring a craft activity with them or just pop in for refreshments and a chat. We have an accessible toilet. Bank holidays and public holidays may offer different opening times, check directly with the venue

properties.title: The Courtyard

properties.description: Monday to Friday - 9am to 4pm We will continue to provide a warm, safe space for anyone who needs it. We are a registered Talk Community Hub offering support and signposting to those who need it, including on cost-of-living pressures, housing, health & wellbeing. We will provide food and drink, an opportunity for people to take part in activities and respond to requests for new things to take part in. We will continue to operate our community larder. Bank holidays and public holidays may offer different opening times, check directly with the venue.
